The Raven - Legacy of a Master Thief' is a thrilling crime adventure in three
episodes from the creators of 'The Book of Unwritten Tales'. Full of twists
and turns, it immerses you in both sides of the story, combining
thrill-of-the-chase whodunit with the risk and reward of a heist story.

1. Unrar
2. Install the Update
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory to your
game installraven directory
5. Play the game using the launcher exe. Our update installer will update
your shortcuts to point to this
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
